list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a deduction from the usual cost of something, typically given for prompt or advance payment or to a special category of buyers.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: many stores will offer a discount on bulk purchases
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nhiều cửa hàng sẽ giảm giá cho việc mua hàng số lượng lớn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: deduct an amount from (the usual price of something).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: current users qualify for a discounted price
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Người dùng hiện tại đủ điều kiện nhận giá giảm giá

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: regard (a possibility, fact, or person) as being unworthy of consideration because it lacks credibility.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'd heard rumors, but discounted them
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã nghe tin đồn, nhưng giảm giá chúng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a store or business) offering goods for sale at discounted prices.
